data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Yogyakarta, Indonesia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yogyakarta, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 117,601 believers in the state of Yogyakarta into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Yogyakarta, Indonesia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, let it be said of the 3,547,799 lost in Yogyakarta that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Yogyakarta, Indonesia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Taje people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Taje people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Taje people is yours.
Spirit, guide seekers in Yogyakarta, Indonesia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Yogyakarta, Indonesia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Yogyakarta
location.people_groups_list: Taloki, Turk, Lubu, Lola, Warabal, Madura
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Taloki (600), Turk (1,000), Lubu (55,000), Lola, Warabal (1,000), Madura (7,570,000)
